title_sort: james r. osgood & company to walt whitman, 13 december 1881
title: James R. Osgood & Company to Walt Whitman, 13 December 1881
text: JR OSGOOD AND CO211 TREMONT STREET, Boston,DecrDecember 13 1881.Walt Whitman, Esq.Dear Sir:We have sent you the 15 Leaves of Grass & 30 sheets as desired.We enclose a list of editorials already sent for purposes of comparison, in case you might happen to duplicate.We do not think the disposal of the old edition will in the least interfere with the new one; and shall be very glad if the new attention called to your Osgood letter Dec: 13 '81 | permission to sell the '76 edition | ☝ writings enables you to dispose of them speedily and completelyVery truly Yours:James R. Osgood & Co.P.S. We find there are only 6 sets of the sheets of new poems left.—these we sendPapers to which "Leaves of Grass" have been sent, by J.R.O. & Co.BostonAdvertiserAtlantic MonthlyBudgetCom.
